title: Week 5 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, How Bizarre - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/8
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Win in Week 5! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of Week 5 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Rams/Seahawks game, and Jason spins the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 8th, 2021.
  
 (03:40) - FootClan Friday
 (04:40) - Thursday Night Football Recap
 (10:30) - NFL News
 (20:20) - Fantasy Forecast
 (20:55) - Eagles at Panthers
 (24:20) - Patriots at Texans
 (28:05) - Bears at Raiders
 (32:55) - Browns at Chargers
 (36:55) - Giants at Cowboys
 (41:55) - 49ers at Cardinals
 (49:35) - Bills at Chiefs
 (51:55) - Colts at Ravens
 (58:00) - Fantasy Faceoff + Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
